title: Survival Records of 3650 Days in the Otherworld - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Fantasy   Harem   Shounen   Slice of Life
tags: Cute Children   Fat to Fit   Kingdom Building   Male Protagonist   Marriage   Polygamy   Royalty   Transmigration   Transported to Another World
author: Zaksalking
description:
Jang Joonbum started stream to enjoy an easy life.

That is what he believed it would be like at least.

He fell asleep in the outback woods after eating like a wild man as a new form of content but wakes up in a completely new world.

A world that was the embodiment of the wilderness itself.>
